creditline: The Rebecca and Ben Field Endowment for Art Acquisition
text: Almost four feet long, this chain consists of ten halved nuts that are pear-shaped and colorful beads threaded on native cord. One end if further decorated with a string of black thin coconut shell disks and a small silver ornament. In the middle of the chain, a Christian aluminum medallion has been attached to one of the half-nuts, showing Mary and the Infant on one side, and Jesus on the other.
title: Opele oracle chain
